h3_title: Yaoguai King - Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish
content: When you've got his health down to around 30%, Zhu Bajie will leave you to take him on one-on-one. The aim is still to just attack normally to get his health bar down quickly.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Emerald Hall' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai King - Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish'.
The content is as follows:
When you've got his health down to around 30%, Zhu Bajie will leave you to take him on one-on-one. The aim is still to just attack normally to get his health bar down quickly.
